thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com | 3 of 336
thread.title: Mel

author: Mel
title: Mel
text: If you have text books to sell, I highly recommend this site. I did a search to compare prices on each book I wanted to return. Most of the time sellbackyourBook had the best offer. It was easy to complete the request, print the free shipping label and send it off. I was notified as soon as they received my shipment, and had the check in my hand several days later just as promised.
